entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
